question: What is the area of a rectangle with length 5 m and width 3 m?
If the density of an object is 2 kg/m³ and its volume is 4 m³, what is its mass?
A car travels a distance of 200 km in 4 hours. What is its average speed?
If the time taken for an object to travel a distance of 100 m is 20 s, what is its speed?
What is the weight of an object with a mass of 5 kg? (Take g = 10 m/s²)
If a car moves 100 m east and then 50 m north, what is its displacement?
A force of 50 N acts in the east direction, and another force of 30 N acts in the west direction. What is the resultant force?
If a vector has a magnitude of 5 units and points due north, what are its horizontal and vertical components respectively?
A displacement of 10 m is east, and another displacement of 8 m is north. What is the magnitude of the resultant displacement?
If a vector has a magnitude of 15 units and points at an angle of 30 degrees with the x-axis, what are its horizontal and vertical components respectively?
An object accelerates uniformly from rest at 2 m/s² for 5 seconds. What is its final velocity?
What is the distance traveled by a car with a constant speed of 20 m/s for 10 seconds?
If a car accelerates uniformly from rest at 3 m/s² for 8 seconds, what is its displacement?
What is the average velocity of a car that travels 300 m east in 20 seconds?
A train decelerates uniformly from 30 m/s to rest in 10 seconds. What is its deceleration?
What is the weight of a body with a mass of 10 kg? (Take g = 9.8 m/s²)
If an object has a weight of 100 N on Earth, what is its weight on the moon? (Take g_moon = 1.6 m/s²)
What is the gravitational force between two objects of masses 5 kg and 10 kg placed 2 meters apart? (Take G = 6.67 × 10^(-11) Nm²/kg²)
If the mass of an object is doubled, how does its weight change?
What is the gravitational potential energy of an object of mass 2 kg placed at a height of 5 m above the ground? (Take g = 9.8 m/s²)
